message.subject: Testing
message.body: Test MessageZone 1 temperature above advisable threshold {{UI1}} °F, please inspect HVAC elements because wire sheet control value SV3={{SV3}} °F is out of bounds. Wire sheet value SV2={SV2}} °F. Cooling stage 1 is in {{BO1}} state, Cooling stage 2 is in {{BO2}} state, and Fan is in {{BO3}} state.
